H0.text: What is the fastest animal on two legs. Emu

H1.text: What is the fastest animal on two legs. Cassowary

H2.text: What is the fastest animal on two legs. Kangaroo

H3.text: What is the fastest animal on two legs. Ostrage

A4.text: With the ability to run at 70 km/h (43.5 mph), they are the fastest birds on land.
